headline: How A US$471 Million Regulatory Charge At Sempra (SRE) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Sempra recently disclosed in a regulatory filing that San Diego Gas & Electric expects to record an after-tax charge of about US$471 million in the fourth quarter of 2025 tied to a Track 2 recommended regulatory decision. This sizeable one-off charge highlights how regulatory outcomes can materially affect Sempra’s earnings profile and the risk balance within its regulated utility operations. We’ll now examine how this expected US$471 million earnings charge could influence Sempra’s existing...
